```{r load packages}

library(ggridges)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(epiR)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)

`%!in%` <- Negate(`%in%`)

theme_set(theme_bw())

```

I exclude 16 participants. Two participants stated that they were not serious when answering the survey. Eight participants suggested that they don't speak German in the demographic question. 
```{r load data and data exclusion}
df <- read.csv("clean_pilot.csv")


# first step filtering 
df <- df %>% filter(df$quality != "notserious")
df <- df %>% filter(df$language != "not_german")

# second step filtering 
df <- df %>% filter(df$ID %!in% c(2425, 2331, 2311, 2275, 2257))


#third step filtering

df <- df %>% filter(df$ID %!in% c(df_exclu$ID))

```


```{r three sub-datesets}
df <- df %>% mutate(event_type = ifelse(event_item %in% diff_event, "indiff",
                                        ifelse(event_item %in% plausible_event, "plau", "implau")))


df_indiff <- df %>% filter(event_type == "indiff")
df_plau <- df %>% filter(event_type == "plau")
df_implau <- df %>% filter(event_type == "implau")


df_indiff <- df_indiff %>% 
    mutate(item_id = group_indices_(df_indiff, .dots=c("labelling"))) %>%
  select(ID, event_type, event_item, answer, event_comp, item_id) %>% 
  group_by(event_comp, event_item) %>% 
  mutate(mean_event_item = mean(answer),
         sd_event_item = sd(answer))



df_indiff$item_id <- as.factor(df_indiff$item_id)

df_plau <- df_plau %>% 
  mutate(item_id = group_indices_(df_plau, .dots=c("labelling"))) %>%
  select(ID, event_type, event_item, answer, event_comp, item_id) %>% 
  group_by(event_comp, event_item) %>% 
  mutate(mean_event_item = mean(answer),
         sd_event_item = sd(answer))


df_implau <- df_implau %>% 
  mutate(item_id = group_indices_(df_implau, .dots=c("labelling"))) %>%
  select(ID, event_type, event_item, answer, event_comp, item_id) %>% 
  group_by(event_comp, event_item) %>% 
  mutate(mean_event_item = mean(answer),
         sd_event_item = sd(answer))

```

```{r meansd function}
 meansd <- function(x, ...) {
   mean <- mean(x)
  sd <- sd(x)
  c(mean - sd, mean, mean + sd)
}
```

```{r}
ggplot(df_draw, aes(x = answer, y= item_id, fill= event_comp)) + 
    geom_density_ridges(quantile_lines = T,
                      panel_scaling = FALSE,
                       scale = 2, size = 0.3, rel_min_height = 0.01, alpha = 0.7) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 20)) +
    scale_fill_discrete(name = "Types of estimation", labels = c("P(A)", "1 - P(not-A)"))  + 
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
        legend.position = "bottom",
        plot.margin = margin(l=100, r=100))+
   geom_vline(xintercept=c(30, 50, 70), linetype="dotted") +
  facet_wrap(.~group_number, scales = "free")  + 
  xlab("Probability estimate") + 
  ylab("item ID") + 
  ggtitle("Density plot of probability estimates")

ggsave("norming_data.png")
  

```












```{r}
df_indiff <- df_indiff %>%
  group_by(event_comp) %>%
  mutate(mean_difference = abs(50 - mean_event_item))

df_indiff <- df_indiff %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = event_comp, values_from = mean_event_item)


df_indiff  <- df_indiff   %>%
  group_by(ID, item_id) %>% 
  fill(pos, .direction = "updown") %>%
  fill(neg, .direction = "updown")%>%
  select(-answer) %>% 
  unique()

df_indiff_selected <- df_indiff %>% 
  mutate(diff_mean_pos_neg = abs(pos-neg)) %>%
  filter(diff_mean_pos_neg < 10 & sd_event_item <= 20)

moederate <- unique(df_indiff_selected$item_id) %>% as.vector()
```
